holidays.title: Beer Day Britain
holidays.description: Nothing gets a Brit going like a pint of beer and a cause for celebration!

holidays.title: BoxKart Bash Day
holidays.description: Unleash your creativity and test your bravery and D.I.Y. skills this BoxKart Bash Day.

holidays.title: Clean Your Vents Day
holidays.description: When last did you check your home’s vents? Well, today’s the day.

holidays.title: Global Wind Day
holidays.description: Help save the planet and boost the international economy through wind power this Global Wind Day.

holidays.title: Magna Carta Day
holidays.description: Visit libraries and museums this Magna Carta Day and learn about the Great Charter history.

holidays.title: National Bug Busting Day
holidays.description: Although they're not particularly dangerous, lice certainly cause a lot of irritation and distress.

holidays.title: National Prune Day
holidays.description: It’s time to include prunes in your meals for a healthier diet this National Prune Day.

holidays.title: National Salvation Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the return of Azerbaijan’s national leader Heydar Aliyev to Baku on National Salvation Day.

holidays.title: National Turkey Lovers Day
holidays.description: Join the tribe of turkey lovers and make some fun dishes this Turkey Lovers’ Day.

holidays.title: Nature Photography Day
holidays.description: Learn more about nature and enjoy capturing it at its best over the warm summer months.

holidays.title: Sneak A Kiss Day
holidays.description: Do you feel like kissing your partner? Today is perfect for sneaking in a kiss!

holidays.title: Trinity Sunday
holidays.description: Trinity Sunday celebrates the unity of the Holy Trinity: the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

holidays.title: YMA Day
holidays.description: Commemorate the Young Mizo Association in India’s founding day through social services and philanthropic works.

holidays.title: Aurora Aksnes’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented singer and songwriter, who looks like a fairy, is rising fast and very fast!

holidays.title: Courteney Cox’s Birthday
holidays.description: It has been a steady climb to success for this multi-brand ambassador, gifted actress, producer, and director.

holidays.title: Da Real Gee Money’s Birthday
holidays.description: Even though he had a short lifespan, he made a name for himself as a rapper.

holidays.title: eLL cartoons’s Birthday
holidays.description: The future holds much promise for this smart YouTuber who has entertained a lot of fans.

holidays.title: Garrett Watts’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTube star’s bubbly personality has won the hearts of millions around the world.

holidays.title: Ice Cube’s Birthday
holidays.description: A rapper, record producer, actor, writer, comedian, film producer, and director. There's nothing he can't do!

holidays.title: North West’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is a bright future ahead for this young star. Celebrate her special day today!
